comment: She is not clear on assignments and very disorganized. She makes up with it a little by cutting some slack to students if you have a good reason. She gives extra credit pop quizzes in class from power points and lecture.

This professor is very disorganized and seem to have no clue what she is doing as far as the class work is concerned. She puts up the wrong quiz that is not associated with the chapter we think we were doing the quiz on. She just seems always all over the place with assignment dates and assignments in general. I would never take her again.
Overall, Dr. Ward appears to be very disorganized.
She clearly cares about her students. She makes every effort to help you even when you are have slacked off. Most professors would just give up on you. She's cool!

I took Dr. Ward for multiple classes and she is good professor. She makes the topics relevant and easy to comprehend. Her test are fairly easy if you read and study the power points. Her classes are interactive so attendance is a must.

The class is fairly easy but was difficult at times bc it was disorganized. I think Prof Ward's class would've been a lot better in class than online. She would have all these folder for us to turn stuff in with due dates but tell us it's not due that day.  whhattttt
